profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-09-03 13:19:09 -0400.

repository.corpname: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

did.abstract: The collection contains a volume of clippings documenting the 38th National Industrial Exhibition of the American Institute, which took place in New York City from August to October 1869. The volume bears the stationer's label of W. Reid Gould, New York City.
did.physloc: The materials are located onsite in the department.

bioghist.head: Biographical Sketch
bioghist.p: Hneri L. Stuart attended the 38th National Industrial Exhibition of the American Institute, which took place in New York City from August to October 1869.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains a volume of clippings documenting the 38th National Industrial Exhibition of the American Institute, which took place in New York City from August to October 1869. The volume bears the stationer's label of W. Reid Gould, New York City.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: The collection is unprocessed and is likely disorganized. Individual items may be difficult to find.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted because it is unprocessed. Portions of the collection may contain recent administrative records and/or personally identifiable information. While it is likely that portions of the collection may be viewed, access must be managed by an archivist.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The researcher assumes full responsibility for conforming with the laws of copyright. Whenever possible, the M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives will provide information about copyright owners and other restrictions, but the legal determination ultimately rests with the researcher. Requests for permission to publish material from this collection should be discussed with the Head of Special Collections and Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows: Identification of specific item, series, box, folder, Henri L. Stuart Papers, 1869. M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University Libraries, University at Albany, State University of New York (hereafter referred to as the Stuart Papers).

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The collection was purchased from dealer Dauber & Pine in 1966.
